author: Business Insider
description:
As companies plan their path to an IPO, thoughtful compensation and equity frameworks are essential.

Join Business Insider and Fidelity for a live virtual discussion that brings together top HR, finance, and legal industry thought leaders as they share actionable insights and evolving best practices for preparing your organization for public markets. What you'll learn:

– Compensation Frameworks: Understand how to align salary, bonus, and long-term incentives to support talent retention.
– Stakeholder Alignment: Learn about approaches for presenting data-driven comp analyses to boards and investors.
– Governance & Compliance: Review key considerations for SEC reporting, proxy disclosures, and admin processes.
– Equity Plan Design: Explore trends in grant structures, vesting schedules, and refresh strategies, and public plan readiness.

Presented by Fidelity.

------------------------------------------------------

#businessinsider #ipo #market 

Business Insider tells you all you nee
title: Beyond the Bell: Navigating The Path To Public | Business Insider

title: Training to go to #space involves years of rigorous preparation. #astronaut #NASA

author: Business Insider
description:
The US is the world’s biggest weapons exporter, controlling about 43% of the global arms trade. American-made weapons like F-35 jets, M1 Leopard tanks, and 155mm artillery shells move worldwide through military aid and foreign sales. 

America sends its allies billions in weapons, including aid packages for Ukraine and missile defense systems for Israel. Defense contractors also sell large amounts of equipment to Saudi Arabia and key NATO allies, including Poland.

So how did America become the world’s dominant weapons dealer? What risks come with it? And who depends on US weapons the most?

0:00 - Intro
00:50 - Building the World’s Biggest Weapons Industry
03:38 - How Saudi Arabia Became Its Biggest Buyer
04:22 - Israel’s Weapons Ties to America
05:40 - Ukraine
07:59 - Poland
09:12 - The United Kingdom
10:32 - Norway
12:23 - Japan
13:31 - South Korea
14:49 - India
16:38 - US Arms Deals Backfiring
19:54 - The Future of US Weapons Deals
20:51 - Credits 

-------------------------------
title: How America Became The World’s Top Arms Exporter
